channel.title: Matthieu Petrigh | Consultant in Website Security and Performance
channel.description: Generated by Matthieu Petrigh. Source page: https://www.petrigh.dev/index.html

item.title: NFT, Smiloo Collection - Smiloo 35
item.description: Designed by Matthieu Petrigh in 2023, Smiloo is a rare 183 piece collection of digital art that depicts moods, smiley-like faces that can serve on many occasions. Each contains a set of unique features, spanning black and white color, eyes, face, headgear, mooth, and nose.

item.title: Are UK Security and Cyber-Security Companies Using Modern Website Security Features To Protect Their Own Websites?
item.description: This small scale research has demonstrated that all too often, security companies and cyber-security companies are not implementing modern website security features to protect their own websites.

item.title: Website Performance and Security: A Comparative Analysis of 1000 Websites
item.description: This small scale research has demonstrated that all too often, the overall performance of websites (speed and security) is rather weak, with an average performance of 36.48%. More importantly, evidence reveals that website’s security is not taken seriously by their respective owners, with an average security rating of only 19.26%.
